author: Sarah Chen
content: This is exactly what we need! Dark mode would be a game-changer for our team who works late hours. Looking forward to seeing this implemented.

author: Michael Rodriguez
content: Agreed! I've been using browser extensions to force dark mode, but native support would be much better.

author: Emily Johnson
content: Would love to see customizable themes as well - maybe a choice between pure black OLED-friendly dark mode and a softer dark gray theme?

author: David Kim
content: Great idea! OLED dark mode would be perfect for mobile devices to save battery.

author: Lisa Wang
content: Please also consider accessibility - make sure there's enough contrast in dark mode for users with visual impairments.

author: Sarah Chen
content: Absolutely! WCAG 2.1 AA compliance should be maintained in both light and dark themes.

author: James Thompson
content: Will this support automatic switching based on system preferences? That would be super convenient.

author: Rachel Green
content: Yes please! Automatic theme switching based on time of day would be amazing too.

author: Alex Martinez
content: This is marked as planned - any ETA on when we might see this feature roll out?

author: Sam Patel
content: Can't wait for this! My eyes will thank you. Working late nights would be so much more comfortable.

author: Jessica Liu
content: Would be great if we could preview the dark theme before it's fully released. Beta access perhaps?

author: Michael Rodriguez
content: I'd love to be part of a beta program! Happy to provide feedback and report any issues.

author: Emily Johnson
content: Make sure code snippets and syntax highlighting look good in dark mode too!

author: David Kim
content: This feature has my vote! Hope it includes dark mode for the mobile app too.

author: Lisa Wang
content: Mobile dark mode is essential! Most of my usage is on my phone in the evening.

author: James Thompson
content: Really excited about this! Dark mode has been on my wishlist since day one.

author: Rachel Green
content: Thank you for listening to user feedback and prioritizing this feature!

author: Alex Martinez
content: Consider adding a 'schedule' option - dark mode from 6 PM to 6 AM automatically.

author: Sam Patel
content: Love this idea! Or tie it to sunset/sunrise times based on location.

author: Jessica Liu
content: This is going to make such a huge difference for daily usage. Keep up the great work team!
